title: The Innkeeper's Holiday
description:
Our story tonight is called The Innkeeper’s Holiday and it’s a story about a favorite time of year celebrated at the Inn by the lake. It’s also about glass ornaments and pinecones, twinkle lights on the water and caring for a place where cheer and merriment can live.
Buy the book:http://hyperurl.co/NothingMuchHappens
Get beautiful NMH merch: https://www.podswag.com/collections/nothing-much-happens
Get an autographed copies: https://www.nothingmuchhappens.com/nmh-stuff 
Get our ad-free and bonus episodes here: https://nothingmuchhappens.supportingcast.fm
author: contact@nothingmuchhappens.com (Kathryn Nicolai)
